scripts.publish:common-utils: npx nx build common-utils && cd dist/packages/common/utils && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:sinbix-sinbix: npx nx build sinbix-sinbix && cd dist/packages/sinbix/sinbix && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:sinbix-cli: npx nx build sinbix-cli && cd dist/packages/sinbix/cli && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:sinbix-core: npx nx build sinbix-core && cd dist/packages/sinbix/core && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:sinbix-utils: npx nx build sinbix-utils && cd dist/packages/sinbix/utils && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:plugins-common: npx nx build plugins-common && cd dist/packages/plugins/common && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:plugins-node: npx nx build plugins-node && cd dist/packages/plugins/node && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:plugins-plugin: npx nx build plugins-plugin && cd dist/packages/plugins/plugin && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:sinbix: npm run publish:sinbix-core && npm run publish:sinbix-utils && npm run publish:sinbix-cli && npm run publish:sinbix-sinbix
scripts.publish:plugins: npm run publish:plugins-common && npm run publish:plugins-node && npm run publish:plugins-plugin
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:common && npm run publish:sinbix && npm run publish:plugins
scripts.update:core: npm run publish:all && npm run install:core
